selected_quotes: Always knew ResNets looked awfully similar to boosting! Huang, Ash, Langford and Schapire have now demonstrated it
Learning Deep ResNet Blocks Sequentially using Boosting Theory #Deeplearning #machinelearning
very cool work by Furong Huang (started at
ResNet deep networks now easier train by training Blocks Sequentially using Boosting
Tweaked ResNets are same as sums of weak module classifiers like in boosting - results in efficient BoostResNet!
